parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs. You can specify an asterisk (\*) as the value to match all applications under the domain name. You can view the application name on the [Stream Management](~~197397~~) page of the ApsaraVideo Live console.

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the live stream. You can specify an asterisk (\*) as the value to match all streams in the application. You can view the stream name on the [Stream Management](~~197397~~) page of the ApsaraVideo Live console.
